ReportSection.name: Introduction
ReportSection.ReportItem:
The information about a faculty member under the “My Profile” tab reflects the period from July 1 {$startYear} to June 30 {$endYear} and is organized into the following general categories.

  1. The “Current Position and Employment History” data has been obtained from the eFEC system.
  2. The “Honors and Awards” section has been imported from the eFEC system and from a list maintained by the office of the Dean of Science.
  3. The Patent and Commercialization section uses data provided by TEC Edmonton.
  4. The “Courses Taught” section has been imported from a Beartracks data dump.
  5. The “Supervision and Training Responsibilities” section is obtained from two sources: (a) FGSR data on graduate students who have a milestone in the system, i.e., MSc students who have defended their thesis and PhD students who have gone through candidacy; (b) Undergraduate trainees, Technicians and Post-doctoral fellows are obtained from the eFEC system. Graduate students with no milestones (MSc course-based, or thesis-based MSc who have not defended before June 30 {$endYear} or PhD who have not passed their candidacy before June 30 {$endYear} are not included).
  6. The “Publications” section has been obtained from the eFEC system.
  7. The “Presentations” section is obtained from the eFEC system.
  8. Entries in the “Research Funding” section come from a data dump provided by RSO from Grants 3.0. NSERC makes available successful-application data. We have downloaded the NSERC data set (from http://open.canada.ca/data/en/dataset/c1b0f627-8c29-427c-ab73-33968ad9176e) and it is available under the “My Profile/Funding/Awards” tab.
  9. The “Service to the University and the Profession” has been imported from the eFEC system.

All this data can be updated from the corresponding tabs under "My Profile"; relevant instructions on how to update each type of data is available on each tab
